subject: RE: [junit] TestCase Dependency Hierarchy
msgSnippet: ... Keine Ursache! :) ... Yes, I guessed so. Oviously it wasn t what Adam was reading in your words, so I tried it with my own. Seems as if I failed, too... :o
messageBody:
J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
>> So said Ilja Preuss on 2003-08-01 -------------------- Adam Jack
>> wrote:
>>
>>> What test runners do most ordinary folks [and not just the junit
>>> experts who've been using it for years] use most, do those runner
>>> primarily use collectors, and do suites add value to those runners?
>>
>> I don't understand the intent of the question. Without the TestSuite
>> class, the collectors couldn't do their work, so it seems to me.
>
> Viele Dank!

Keine Ursache! :)

> This is what I have been saying all along.

Yes, I guessed so. Oviously it wasn't what Adam was reading in your
words, so I tried it with my own. Seems as if I failed, too... :o

Regards, Ilja
